profile:
We are Action Home Services, and we always take action for every construction service that you need. Based in Toronto, Ontario, we are a general contracting company that specializes in a wide range of services. We will help you to design and build an outside living area of your dream. Do not wait! Take action with Action Home Services. Check our website at http://actionhomeservices.ca/ to find out more. 

Our Mission
We aim to become one of the most successful construction companies within Toronto, Ontario. This mission will not happen if our services are not up to the level of what our customers are expecting. Thus our main aim is to provide the best services to our customers. Our level of professionalism will become our barometer for customer satisfaction. We also aim to make it a point to have strong ties with our customers so we can grow the level of our professionalism and gain more trust among our clients.

Our Vision
Our dream is to become the one-stop shop for any kind of construction service that any of our clients need. We initially started with interlocking and asphalt paving, but we are now venturing into other services such as landscaping, pressure washing and sealing, concreting, decks and fences, demolition services and many more. We already have a wide range of service offerings, but we are not satisfied with just these. We are excited about every project that we perform and our possibilities for improvement and additional services are endless.

Our Commitment 
We commit to do whatever it takes to achieve the level of satisfaction our customer deserves. Our workmanship will leave a lasting mark and one that will be a reminder of our professionalism and close ties with our clients. We gained the trust of our customers through hard work that pays off when we see our clients happy with the outcome of our services. We will strive to be cooperative and readily available for any queries or requests our customer needs.

At Tornado Plumbing we work hard to fulfill all your plumbing needs, and offer some of the best service in the GTA. Our products are high quality, and all of our work is under warranty. By using the most recent technology we can offer you the best service to ensure your plumbing work is done efficiently and with quality. We provide free estimates, competitive rates, and city rebates are available.
Our services include waterproofing, pipe burst, plumbing repairs, backwater valve, concrete work, water service and repairs, drain camera inspections, drain snaking, and underpinning (basement lowering).
With appointments booked at your convenience, and 24 hour emergency service, you’re sure to get the job done with Tornado Plumbing.

Check us out here:
https://www.facebook.com/TornadoPlumbingCom
https://twitter.com/TornadoPlumbing
https://www.instagram.com/tornado_plumbing/

YouTube videos on various plumbing and drain services may be found in our photo gallery.
services:
Waterproofing
Our skilled crews take all the necessary steps to clean and prepare your foundation wall prior to waterproofing.
We only use materials of the highest industry standard to seal your home from leaks.
With a 25 year warranty, you are guaranteed a dry basement and piece of mind.

Drains
When you need to replace your damaged sewer lines, we meet all city standards for drain work and backwater valves.
Using the minimally invasive pipe burst method, we can have your drains running again quickly.

Water Service
Using trench-less technology we can quickly replace your lead waterline or
upgrade your current water service, causing minimal damage to your property

Plumbing
We can take care of all your plumbing needs no matter the size.
Fixing small leaks to full plumbing line replacement, and everything in between.

Concrete work
From walkways to patio slabs we’ve got all your concrete needs covered.

Underpinning & Walkouts
If you’re looking for more living space, we can lower your basement to your desired height or add a second entrance.
Using approved engineer drawings, and following building codes, we will create the basement you want.

24/7 EMERGENCY SERVICE

Toronto's Finest Concrete is a family owned and operated full service masonry and concrete company that is able to meet both the needs of the residential client and the commercial client who require complex applications of self-leveling cement for installation of hardwood, laminate, tile etc. For both, we provide quality workmanship done in a timely and effective manner, all the while creating an outstanding rapport to build lifelong relationships with our clients. As third generation with a family history of over 40 years of expertise in the masonry and cement industry we are committed to continuing to serve our community and providing quality and affordability to all clients. You can have peace of mind and trust that we will treat your most valuable possessions and your property as we would our own with unparalleled service, quality and integrity.  We offer 10% Senior's Discount & Repeat Customer discounts to help give back to the community that has always given to us. 

Services Include:

*Concrete - patios, stairs, sidewalks/walkways, retaining walls & basement floors

*Waterproofing - leaky basements, damaged foundations walls, indoor/outdoor & weeping tile 

*Stone Work - includes flagstone, coping stone  interlock 

*Self-Leveling Cement - poured over damaged/cracked unlevel concrete substrates to create desired smooth & level finish
